vote.title: Authorize an ordinance amending the Project Plan and Reinvestment Zone Financing Plan (“Plans”) for  the City Center Tax Increment Financing (“TIF”) District (the “Zone”) to approve: (1) the TIF Board’s finding that Klyde Warren Park is an area of public assembly and that TIF funds from the District-Wide Improvement budget category may be used for the Phase 2 expansion of Klyde Warren Park (“KWP2”) because it is a project benefitting the Zone and because such expansion is necessary or convenient to the creation of the Zone or to the implementation of the Plans; and (2) corresponding modifications to the  Plans to reflect these amendments and findings - Financing:  No cost consideration to the City
